description: Returns the definition of a specific DataBrew project.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the project to be described.

nested_items.name: CreateDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the project was created.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: The identifier (user name) of the user who created the project.

nested_items.name: DatasetName
nested_items.description: The dataset associated with the project.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the project was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The identifier (user name) of the user who last modified the project.

nested_items.name: RecipeName
nested_items.description: The recipe associated with this job.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the project.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The number of rows in the sample.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The way in which DataBrew obtains rows from a dataset.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Identity and Access Management (IAM) role to be assumed when DataBrew runs the job.

nested_items.name: SessionStatus
nested_items.description: Describes the current state of the session:
PROVISIONING - allocating resources for the session.
INITIALIZING - getting the session ready for first use.
ASSIGNED - the session is ready for use.

nested_items.name: OpenedBy
nested_items.description: The identifier (user name) of the user that opened the project for use.

nested_items.name: OpenDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the project was opened.
